metadata.title: Red Carpet Studios Fluttering Buddies Garden Balancer, 51-Inch, Finches
features: FLUTTERING BALANCING BUDDIES: Made of powder coated metal and includes a 3-prong stake for displaying
OVERALL DIMENSIONS: Measures approximately 32.28 x 3.93 x 51.96-inches
FLUTTERING FINCHES: A pair of yellow and grey finches perfectly balance with a weighted glass marble while wings flutter in the wind
EASILY DISPLAY: Place in the garden, yard, porch, patio, or balcony; makes a fun gift for any gardener
ADD BEAUTY TO OUTDOOR SPACES: From Red Carpet Studios, a family-owned company offering original home and garden gifts
description: Fluttering Finches Balancing Buddies kinetic garden art. A pair of yellow and grey finches perfectly balance with a weighted glass marble while wings flutter in the wind. Made of powder coated metal and includes a 3-prong stake for displaying. Overall dimensions are approximately 32.28 x 3.93 x 51.96-inches. Look for additional lawn and garden art and decor from Red Carpet Studios. Red Carpet Studios has been a family run business since 2000, when they introduced their now famous garden terrariums. Since then, red carpet has continued to explore the tranquility & allure of the outdoors & has expanded the garden Studio line to include birdhouses, chimes, garden stakes, & a collection of kinetic garden decor. Everything you need to personalize your garden & more!
